message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would really be valuable for you. I'm asking for $150 to start.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. How about $135?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant at $135. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
